name: getpublicdata
description: Retrieves publicly shared weather data from Outdoor Modules within a predefined area.

lat_ne.description: Latitude of the north east corner of the requested area. -85 <= lat_ne <= 85 and lat_ne>lat_sw

lon_ne.description: Longitude of the north east corner of the requested area. -180 <= lon_ne <= 180 and lon_ne>lon_sw

lat_sw.description: Latitude of the south west corner of the requested area. -85 <= lat_sw <= 85

lon_sw.description: Longitude of the south west corner of the requested area. -180 <= lon_sw <= 180

required_data.description: To filter stations based on relevant measurements you want (e.g. rain will only return stations with rain gauges). Default is no filter. You can find all measurements available on the Thermostat page.

filter.description: True to exclude stations with abnormal temperature measures. Default is false.
